entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Snow or periods of ice pellets near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
